languages.text: {n}И вновь те же чувства — бессилие, подчинение, слабость. Вы не принадлежите {mf|самому|самой} себе, хоть разум и не покинул до конца ваше тело. Вы продолжает бороться с {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}тем, что засело у вас в голове{/d}, но эта битва проиграна. Словно издалека вы слышите собственный голос:{/n} "Я... признаюсь в сотрудничестве с ксеносами..."

traits.locale_text: {n}И вновь те же чувства — бессилие, подчинение, слабость. Вы не принадлежите {mf|самому|самой} себе, хоть разум и не покинул до конца ваше тело. Вы продолжает бороться с тем, что засело у вас в голове, но эта битва проиграна. Словно издалека вы слышите собственный голос:{/n} "Я... признаюсь в сотрудничестве с ксеносами..."

languages.text: {n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."
languages.original_text: {n}И вновь те же чувства — бессилие, подчинение, слабость. Вы не принадлежите {mf|самому|самой} себе, хоть разум и не покинул до конца ваше тело. Вы продолжает бороться с {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}тем, что засело у вас в голове{/d}, но эта битва проиграна. Словно издалека вы слышите собственный голос:{/n} "Я... признаюсь в сотрудничестве с ксеносами..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The same feelings return — impotence, submission, weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though the mind has not yet fully left the body. You keep fighting what is stuck in your head, but that battle is lost. As is from a great distance, you hear your own voice:{/n} "I... confess to collaborating with xenos..."

{n}The same feelings return — impotence, submission, weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though the mind has not yet fully left the body. You keep fighting what is stuck in your head, but that battle is lost. As is from a great distance, you hear your own voice:{/n} "I... confess to collaborating with xenos..."

{n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though the mind has not yet fully left the body. You keep fighting whatever is stuck in your head but this is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your own voice go,{/n} "I, uh, confess to collaborating with xenos..."

{n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though the mind has not yet fully left the body. You keep fighting whatever is stuck in your head but this is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your own voice go,{/n} "I, uh, confess to collaborating with xenos..."

{n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting whatever is stuck in your head, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

{n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

{n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

languages.text: {n}Les mêmes sensations vous envahissent : impuissance, soumission, faiblesse. Vous ne vous appartenez plus, même si votre esprit n'a pas encore quitté votre corps. Vous continuez à vous battre {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}contre ce qui sévit dans votre tête{/d}, mais cela semble peine perdue. De loin, vous entendez votre propre voix :{/n} « Je... j'avoue avoir collaboré avec les xénos... »
languages.original_text: {n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mêmes sensations vous envahissent : impuissance, soumission, faiblesse. Vous ne vous appartenez plus, même si votre esprit n'a pas encore quitté votre corps. Vous continuez à vous battre contre tout ce qui se déroule dans votre tête, mais cela semble peine perdue. De loin, vous entendez votre propre voix poursuivre :{/n} « Je, euh... j'avoue avoir collaboré avec les xénos... »

languages.text: {n}同样的感觉又回来了，你感到自己无能、顺从、软弱。虽然你的思想并没有彻底离开身体，但你似乎已经不再属于你自己。你一直努力与{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}脑子里的东西{/d}作斗争，但这场战斗必败无疑。你仿佛听到自己的声音从远处传来。{/n}“我……我承认我与异形勾结……”
languages.original_text: {n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

traits.locale_text: {n}同样的感觉又回来了，你感到自己无能、顺从、软弱。虽然你的思想并没有彻底离开身体，但你似乎已经不再属于你自己。你一直努力与脑子里的东西作斗争，但这场战斗必败无疑。你仿佛听到自己的声音从远处传来。{/n}“我，呃，我承认我与异形勾结……”

languages.text: {n}無力感、服従の念、弱さといった感情がまたよみがえってくる。心はまだ完全に肉体を離れていないにもかかわらず、自分が自分でなくなってしまったようだ。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}頭の中を離れない何か{/d}と戦い続けているが、これはもはや負け戦だ。まるで遠くから発せられたかのように自分の声が聞こえてくる。{/n}「私は…異種族と協力したことを告白します…」
languages.original_text: {n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

traits.locale_text: {n}無力感、服従の念、弱さといった感情がまたよみがえってくる。心はまだ完全に肉体を離れていないにもかかわらず、自分が自分でなくなってしまったようだ。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}頭の中を離れない何か{/d}と戦い続けているが、これはもはや負け戦だ。まるで遠くから発せられたかのように自分の声が聞こえてくる。{/n}「私は…異種族と協力したことを告白します…」

languages.text: {n}Wieder kehren die gleichen Gefühle zurück – Machtlosigkeit, Unterwürfigkeit und Schwäche. Du gehorchst dir nicht mehr selbst, auch wenn dein Geist deinem Körper noch nicht vollständig entwichen ist. Du kämpfst weiter dagegen an, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}was dir durch den Kopf schwirrt{/d}, aber du kannst nicht gewinnen. Aus großer Ferne hörst du dich selbst aussprechen:{/n} "Ich ... Ich gestehe, dass ich mit Xenos kollaboriert habe ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Wieder kehren die gleichen Gefühle zurück – Machtlosigkeit, Unterwürfigkeit und Schwäche. Du gehorchst dir nicht mehr selbst, auch wenn dein Geist deinem Körper noch nicht vollständig entwichen ist. Du kämpfst weiter dagegen an, was dir durch den Kopf schwirrt, aber du kannst nicht gewinnen. Aus großer Ferne hörst du dich selbst aussprechen:{/n} "Ich, äh, gestehe, mit Xenos kollaboriert zu haben ..."

{n}Wieder kehren die gleichen Gefühle zurück – Machtlosigkeit, Unterwürfigkeit und Schwäche. Du gehorchst dir nicht mehr selbst, auch wenn dein Geist deinem Körper noch nicht vollständig entwichen ist. Du kämpfst weiter dagegen an, was dir durch den Kopf schwirrt, aber du kannst nicht gewinnen. Aus großer Ferne hörst du dich selbst aussprechen:{/n} "Ich ... Ich gestehe, dass ich mit Xenos kollaboriert habe ..."

languages.text: {n}Experimentas de nuevo las mismas sensaciones: impotencia, sumisión y debilidad. Ya no eres {mf|dueño|dueña} de tus actos, pese a que tu mente no ha abandonado tu cuerpo del todo. Sigues luchando contra {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}lo que sea que está en tu cabeza{/d}, pero es una batalla perdida. Oyes tu propia voz como si proviniese de muy lejos:{/n} «Yo... confieso haber colaborado con xenos...».
languages.original_text: {n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Experimentas de nuevo las mismas sensaciones: impotencia, sumisión y debilidad. Ya no eres {mf|dueño|dueña} de tus actos, pese a que tu mente no ha abandonado tu cuerpo del todo. Sigues luchando contra lo que sea que está en tu cabeza, pero es una batalla perdida. Oyes tu propia voz como si proviniese de muy lejos:{/n} «Yo, eh, confieso haber colaborado con xenos...».

languages.text: {n}Aynı his geri geliyor: Acizlik, itaat ve zayıflık. Zihnin henüz bedenini tamamen terk etmemiş olsa da artık kendine ait değilsin. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}Kafana giren şey her neyse{/d} onunla savaşmayı sürdürüyorsun. Gelgelelim bu, kaybetmeye mahkûm olduğun bir savaş. Uzaklardan kendi sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Ben. Zenolarla iş birliği yaptığımı itiraf ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The same feelings return: impotence, submission, and weakness. You no longer belong to yourself, even though your mind has not yet fully left your body. You keep fighting {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}whatever is stuck in your head{/d}, but it is a losing battle. As if from afar, you hear your voice:{/n} "I... I confess to collaborating with xenos..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aynı his geri geliyor: Acizlik, itaat ve zayıflık. Zihnin henüz bedenini tamamen terk etmemiş olsa da artık kendine ait değilsin. Kafana giren şey her neyse onunla savaşmayı sürdürüyorsun ama bu kaybetmeye mahkûm olduğun bir savaş. Uzaklardan kendi sesini duyuyorsun:{/n} "Ben. Zenolarla iş birliği içinde olduğumu itiraf ediyorum."
